Any solutions?

item.title: [317]Fletching with Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

Note: I don`t give permission to any one to use this in any other community.

Since I started here, in the MoparScape community and since it helped me alot, I`ll try to help someone else in this community too.

• Protocol: 317
• Tested on: iClarity
• Requirements: Time, and a brain
• Difficulty: 2/10 (May be more to new users)

Okay. So I`ve been working on fletching with Interfaces, it has custom Fletching experience, which can be changed in the Fletching class, you can choose how much bows you would like to make (1,5,10), and has level requirement.

Step 1:
(Sorry I had to use pastebin, because I have reached 20k characters lol.)
So, create a new class called “Fletching.java”.
Add this in it:
http://pastebin.com/G6thBamJ

What this cases actually do :

case 1511: //Logs p.logId = 1511; p.Fletching = true; p.sendFrame246(8883, 250, 52); p.sendFrame246(8884, 200, 50); p.sendFrame246(8885, 200, 48); p.sendFrame126("Long Bow", 8897); p.sendFrame126("Short Bow", 8893); p.sendFrame126("Arrow Shaft", 8889); p.sendFrame164(8880); break;

1511 = is the ID for Logs, so if use a knife on Logs it will open you an interface in which you can select what would you like to fletch.

52 is the id of Arrow shaft. If you use a knife on Logs(1511), a chatbox interface will pop-up, and will ask you what would you like to fletch. So if you would click on the arrow shafts, it would use the “case 52” for fletching the arrow shafts.

[code]case 52: if (p.getLevelForXP(p.playerXP[9]) >= 1) {
if (p.HasItemAmount(946, 1)) {
p.startAnimation(1248);

              p.addItem(52, 15);
                            p.deleteItem(1511, p.GetItemSlot(1511), 1);
              p.addSkillXP(100, 9);

p.sendMessage(“You just made some arrows shaft.”);
} else {
p.isFletching = false;
p.fletchDelAmt = 0;
}
} else {
p.showDialogue(“You need at least 1 Fletching to make this!”);
p.isFletching = false;
p.fletchDelAmt = 0;
}

        break;[/code]

Step 2:
Open your Player class(Player.java), and declare this.


public int fletchDelay;
	public int bowId;
	public int fletchDelAmt;
	public int fletchXpInc;
	public boolean isFletching;
	public boolean Fletching;
	public int logId;

Step 3:
Open your Client class(Client.java/clientHandler.java), and add this to your imports:

This is going to import your Fletching class in the Client class

Step 4:
In your Client class(Client.java/clientHandler.java), and search for:

Scroll a bit down, and you will see something like this:

if (LogoutDelay > 0) {
			LogoutDelay--;
		}[/code]
(Do not forget to add this, this is one of the most important things)
Add there somewhere, below the last bricket this:


	      [code]


if (isFletching && fletchDelay <= 0) {
			Fletching.fletchItem(this);
		}

This is going to start fletching.

Step 5:
Okay, now open your ActionButtons/clickingMost class(ActionButtons.java…)

And search for:

Now when you found it, below add this:

[code]case 34185:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 52;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1521) {
p.bowId = 54;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1519) {
p.bowId = 60;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1517) {
p.bowId = 64;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1515) {
p.bowId = 68;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1513) {
p.bowId = 72;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
}
break;
case 34189:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 2862) {
p.bowId = 4825;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 50;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
}
break;

case 34193:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 48;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1521) {
p.bowId = 56;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1519) {
p.bowId = 58;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1517) {
p.bowId = 62;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1515) {
p.bowId = 66;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1513) {
p.bowId = 70;
p.fletchDelAmt = 1;
p.isFletching = true;
}
}
break;

case 34184:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 52;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1521) {
p.bowId = 54;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1519) {
p.bowId = 60;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1517) {
p.bowId = 64;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1515) {
p.bowId = 68;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1513) {
p.bowId = 72;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
}
break;
case 34192:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 2862) {
p.bowId = 4825;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 50;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
}
break;

case 34188:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 48;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1521) {
p.bowId = 56;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1519) {
p.bowId = 58;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1517) {
p.bowId = 62;
p.fletchDelAmt = 5;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1515) {
p.bowId = 66;

p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1513) {
p.bowId = 70;

}
}
break;

case 34183:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 52;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1521) {
p.bowId = 54;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1519) {
p.bowId = 60;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1517) {
p.bowId = 64;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1515) {
p.bowId = 68;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1513) {
p.bowId = 72;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
}
break;
case 34191:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 2862) {
p.bowId = 4825;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 50;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
}
break;

case 34187:
if (p.Fletching) {
if (p.logId == 1511) {
p.bowId = 48;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1521) {
p.bowId = 56;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1519) {
p.bowId = 58;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1517) {
p.bowId = 62;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1515) {
p.bowId = 66;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
if (p.logId == 1513) {
p.bowId = 70;
p.fletchDelAmt = 10;
p.isFletching = true;
}
}
break;
[/code]

This are the ActionButtons from your fletchMenu, this is going to fletch the bows when you click on the desired item in your fletchMenu chatbox Interface.(Contains 1 bow making, 5 bows making and 10 bows making)

Step 6:

Okay, so this is the last thing you have to do(Copy&Paste)
Open up your ItemOnItem class(ItemOnItem.java)

And add this somewhere in it:


if (itemUsed == 946 || useWith == 946) {
			Fletching.fletchMenu(p, useWith, itemUsed);
		}

So if you use a knife on a log, or a log on a knife this is going to open up the fletchMenu.

Some Pictures:

Logs

Achey tree log

Animation, messages…

Hope this helped. This is tested on iClarity, if you are going to use it on any other base you`ll probably have to convert.
